logisticsPage.pageDesc: We believe in developing relationships with suppliers and clients. We operate from the third-party warehouses, staffed by professionals and operate under SOP (Standard Operating Procedure), so we can deliver high service levels to our customers.
logisticsPage.transportDesc: Working with 4PL partners for rail, road, air and sea transport allows us to offer flexible and scalable transport solutions. We collaborate with clients in team-based environments and can swiftly map out and solve their distribution challenges.
logisticsPage.bullet5: Track and trace for shipments in Europe

specializations.title: Our specializations
specializations.desc: Specializations are our strength. Benefits of specializations are constant monitoring of the industry labor market, understanding Clients' needs in particular sectors of industry, identifying candidates by means of a professional market analysis and our own database, and fast completion of order.

missionPage.title: About us
missionPage.pageDesc: 'Adami/ Miad Group' a highly motivated international team of young entrepreneurial individuals with 'can do' attitude, concurring impossible and easily connecting the demand & supply around the World within speed of the light. With our mission, we guarantee our Partners a smooth sourcing, support and successful collaboration.

contactPage.title: Contact us
contactPage.pageDesc: Aby się z nami skontaktować - napisz maila na adres podany poniżej lub uzupełnij formularz kontaktowy. Odpowiemy na Twoje zapytanie najszybciej jak to tylko możliwe!
